channel.title: Problem with npc shops!
channel.description:
Ive had a prblem with making shops.i have put the npc in autospawn.cfg but when i try trading with it it kicks me off server and then i have to log in again
I have put the codes in on the client.java and shops.cfg .
CLIENT.JAVA [code] } else if (NPCID == 587) { //Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 46; //Herblore shop[/code]
SHOPS.CFG shop = 46 @whi@Herblore_Shop 1 1 227 2000 221 2000 235 2000 225 2000 223 2000 1975 2000 239 2000 231 2000 2970 2000 241 2000 245 2000 247 2000 3138 2000
AUTOSPAWN.CFG spawn = 587 3266 3030 0 0 0 0 0 1 herblore_shop Please Help!!

item.title: Problem with npc shops!
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

Let me ask you, do any of your shops work?
If so copy just the first part where it says “shop = 1 WHATEVER SHOP”

Then paste it and edit the shop number and text.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with npc shops!

item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

Just a tip, don’t use spaces between the items and amounts, ALWAYS USE TABS!
